content: This is what should happen. Deport all 3rd world parasites and muslims back to their countries and let them spill their sweat, blood and tears to fix their miserable lives and countries. In the “olden” days none of this would have been permitted. These refugees can either do the hard work to survive or perish. Always remember if the roles were reversed these parasites would not help people from Western cultures. Case in point the muslim infested countries of Qatar, Saudi Aribia, etc,. are not welcoming their mulsim parasite brothers and sisters. All muslims are barbarians and should be allowed to perish. Same goes to African continent and east asian POS.>
